name.ja: <ruby>白の枢機竜<rt>アルバ・システム・ドラグマータ</rt></ruby>

text.en:
"Fallen of Albaz" + 6 monsters in your GY with different names
Must first be Fusion Summoned. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. Cannot declare an attack unless you send 1 card from your Extra Deck to the GY. Once per turn, if you control this Fusion Summoned monster and have 6 or more Fusion Monsters in your GY with different names that mention "Fallen of Albaz" as material: You can send all cards in both players' Extra Decks to the GY.

materials: "Fallen of Albaz" + 6 monsters in your Graveyard with different names
